name: UILongPressGestureRecognizer
desc: A discrete gesture recognizer that interprets long-press gestures.

items.name: var minimumPressDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The minimum time that the user must press on the view for the gesture to be recognized.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of fingers that must touch the view for gesture recognition.

items.name: var numberOfTapsRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of taps on the view necessary for gesture recognition.

items.name: var allowableMovement: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum movement of the fingers on the view before the gesture fails.
